snippet: Sidney Crosby’s five assists and Chris Kunitz’s hat trick helped the Penguins defeat the Islanders for their fifth straight win.
abstract: NHL Roundup; Pittsburgh Penguins defeat New York Islanders, 6-1; other hockey scores noted.

byline.original: By THE ASSOCIATED PRESS and JEFF Z. KLEIN

lead_paragraph: Sidney Crosby’s five assists and Chris Kunitz’s hat trick helped the Penguins defeat the Islanders for their fifth straight win.

headline.seo: Sidney Crosby Has Five Assists as Penguins Beat Islanders
headline.main: Five Assists For Crosby Doom Isles
headline.print_headline: Five Assists For Crosby Doom Isles
